Featured in this article

We have a soft spot (quite literally) for the best Boll & Branch sale of the summer. This AD-favorite bedding brand is offering 20% off sitewide with code SUMMER and up to 40% off select items. As you might have already read, we love this destination for its organic sheets, including the signature organic cotton sateen set that’s available for a great deal. Plus, you can find up to 50% off final sale items like the Reserve embellished duvet set, which boasts an ivory lattice jacquard style that borderlines on couture but is now within reach.

For those who don’t have time to browse, go straight to the Summer Sale Bundle section and stock up for the year. Alternatively, if you feel like your linen closet is in good shape, remember that you can never have too many bed blankets, and when the springy Boll & Branch waffle blankets are 25% off, why not add them to your linen closet? Other pieces that you should not overlook are organic cotton fitted sheets that have 17-inch pockets for the loftiest mattress around.

And if you can't make up your mind, know that there is free shipping on orders of $100 or more, and if you change your mind (we highly doubt it!) returns are complimentary. Here, all of the Boll & Branch sale finds—including editor-tested picks and our wishlist items—we recommend shopping before the deals end on August 5.

Breezy Sheets

  • Photo: Yelena Moroz Alpert

  • Photo: Yelena Moroz Alpert

Boll & Branch Linen Sheet Set

Trust us, you can’t go wrong with the Boll & Branch linen sheet set. “The draping quality of these is really something,” says contributor Yelena Moroz Alpert. “When you sleep in these, it feels like a weekend morning, every morning. I really don’t want to get out of bed because these sheets are like a cozy embrace.” Unlike some other linen sheets that might have noticeably bumpy slubs in the weave, these sheets are almost velvety. “It’s a noticeable difference,” says Alpert, who has compared four linen bedding brands side to side in one day. She has these in the mineral blue hue, which is equally sophisticated and laid-back, but now that the earthy terracotta colorway is discounted 25% with an extra 20% with the code SUMMER, she is seriously pondering getting a second set.

Best Cooling Blanket

  • Photo: Yelena Moroz Alpert

  • Photo: Yelena Moroz Alpert

Boll & Branch Waffle Bed Blanket

Let’s get real: Thick comforters have no place on your bed during summer months. But what if you catch the chill from a running AC? This is where this lightweight waffle cover comes in (one of our all-time favorite cooling blankets). “The Boll & Branch waffle blanket is like a tiny, cushy egg crate for your body,” Alpert explains. “Each waffle section creates an almost springy resistance, so when you have it on your body it feels like you’re padded on the sides, but not in a stuffy way.” It comes in 12 solid colorways, with minty meadow on extra sale. Plus, take a peek at the embellished design with elaborate stitching at the hem. The white waffle blanket with hydrangea blue whipstitch is extra dreamy.

A Classic Set

Boll & Branch Signature Hemmed Sheet Set

Every time we check on the Boll & Branch Signature Hemmed sheet set, the number of reviews goes up. At more that 8,500 reviews, it is no surprise that this collection is a bestseller. The buttery softness of these sheets can be attributed to long-staple cotton fibers that only get lovelier after each wash—commerce director Rachel Fletcher can verify that even after numerous cycles she has not spotted fraying or pilling, just softness which feels lived-in but not worn out. “That extra-soft feel, paired with the lovely, cooling properties, makes them feel like the luxury sheets they are,” she says in her review for best Boll & Branch sheets. The line comes in 20 solid colorways (with terracotta and meadow at an extra 20% off), and 10 floral and striped patterns.

Best Lightweight Duvet Insert

Boll & Branch Down Duvet Insert

For those in search of a lightweight duvet insert consider the down bafflebox construction number that stays fluffy without the bulk. AD PRO senior editor Mel Studach says in her review that this one “made a great first impression” and the attachable corner loops on the organic cotton shell make it easy to situate it within a duvet cover. You’ll love this duvet insert even more knowing that it’s Oeko Tex-certified and machine washable, though you only need to clean it about once a season.

For Sensitive Sleepers

Boll & Branch Down Alternative Pillow

You won’t have to compromise on quality with this high-end down alternative option. The Boll & Branch down alternative pillow uses PrimaLoft Luxury Down Alternative, as the fill fiber mimics the real thing but is allergy friendly. “Usually I prefer down, but it’s genuinely impossible for me to tell the difference here,” commerce writer Julia Harrison writes in her review. It comes in three density options: soft for stomach sleepers, medium for back sleepers, and firm for side sleepers.

Best Bath Towel

Boll & Branch Plush Bath Towel

A plush bath towel is not something to pass up and the velvety selection from Boll & Branch is well worth it, especially when a discount is involved. “This towel is 100% organic cotton and it is sooo fluffy—really just heavenly soft,” says digital features editor Charlotte Collins. “The towels have a sponge-like, very absorbent material. It’s a quicker drying process than with any non-hotel towel I’ve ever used.” These come in 10 colorways, though the Juniper hue is no longer in stock. You’ll appreciate the luxe feel of the terry loops that are quick to absorb water as you wrap yourself post shower. Consider adding matching hand towels into the mix for a complete bathroom ensemble.

A Plush Robe

Boll & Branch Dream Robe

Commerce writer Julia Harrison’s favorite robe, she says this one is comfortable to do everything from cook and snack to sleep and do laundry. The pre-tumbled treatment makes it extra soft, but it also gets even softer after every wash. It’s also just as durable. “[This robe is] lightweight, soft, luxurious without feeling too precious to wear,” she adds. “I’ve washed this a dozen times at least, and it’s still as good as new.”

Best Down Pillow

Boll & Branch Down Chamber Pillow

If you’re a stomach sleeper like contributor Elaheh Nozari, this down pillow will be a dreamy addition to your bedscape. She finds that this soft pillow—which she has in a medium firmness level—has a little density that keeps her head from sinking straight to her mattress. “I could feel the feathery softness when I put my head down but there was enough sturdiness for my head to feel supported,” she says.

More Bedding We’re Browsing

Boll & Branch Wood Frame Bed

Now that you’ve stocked up on bed sheets, consider if your bed frame needs a facelift. The Boll & Branch is more than durable linens, the Wood Frame bed is artisan-made of solid wood with maple and beechwood veneers that uses low VOC stains (oak-like bluff and dark espresso brown). The cutouts in the design will add airiness to the entire bedroom setup. In addition to the 20% discount, you get free White Glove delivery.

Boll & Branch Ultimate Cooling Bundle

Want a one-stop shop for the best sheets, pillowcases, and a blanket? The Boll & Branch Ultimate Cooling bundle lets you mix-and-match different colorways for the bedscaping design that is far from de rigueur. Start by selecting a Dream bed blanket, an organic cotton confection made with four layers. There are seven colors to choose from (terracotta and meadow have an extra discount). Then, decide on the percale hemmed sheet set in either a solid color, stripe, or embellished trim. Finally, add a percale hemmed pillowcase set for the accent pillows. Think of this as a sustainable starter bundle that will last you summer after summer.

Boll & Branch Airy Voile Quilt Set

The Boll & Branch Airy Voile quilt set is already discounted 25% and now you can take an extra 20% off with the code SUMMER. Voile is derived from the French word for veil, and this ethereal fabric is the epitome of lightness. Here, the quilt and two shams are made with long-staple cotton for the shell, and filled with recycled polyester fill for cotton-candy-like loftiness. The embroidered accents are the cherry on top.

Boll & Branch Summer Kickoff Beach Bundle

It wouldn’t be a summer sale if beach towels are not involved. The Summer Kickoff Beach bundle includes two organic Turkish cotton towels (you can choose from a modern geometric plaid or the classic blue-and-white stripes) and a nautical stripe beach blanket that will work equally well on the sand or poolside. The blanket is specially crafted with plush terrycloth texture on the bottom and a sand-resistant weave on the top.

Boll & Branch Signature Short Sleeve Pajama Set

Don’t let your bed have all the fun. The Signature Short Sleeve pajama set is as decadent as the organic cotton sheets you sleep in. These are pre-shrunk and woven from long-staple fibers for buttery softness. And the shorts have pockets. What more could you ask for? The white colorway is already selling quickly, we just have our fingers crossed that the floral print is in stock by the time we check out.
